The following system properties are recognized by Chord 2.0.  The separator for list-valued properties is `' |,|:|;'`.

|| *Property name*     || *Description* || *Default value (if any)* ||
|| *_Mandatory properties_* || || ||
|| chord.work.dir     || Location of working directory during Chord's execution || ||
|| *_Chord boot properties_* || Set by build.xml; must be set manually if running "java chord.project.Main" directly || ||
|| chord.home.dir     || Location of root directory of Chord's installation (basedir of build.xml) || *cannot override* ||
|| chord.props.file   || Location of Chord properties file || ${chord.work.dir}/chord.properties ||
|| chord.max.heap     || Maximum memory size of JVM running Chord || "2048m" ||
|| chord.max.stack    || Maximum thread stack size of JVM running Chord || "32m" ||
|| chord.jvmargs      || Arguments passed to JVM running Chord || "-showversion -ea -Xmx${chord.max.heap} -Xss${chord.max.stack}" ||
|| *_Chord I/O properties_* || || ||
|| chord.out.dir      || Location of directory to which Chord dumps all files || "${chord.work.dir}/chord_output" ||
|| chord.out.file     || Location of file to redirect standard output stream during Chord's execution || "${chord.out.dir}/log.txt" ||
|| chord.err.file     || Location of file to redirect standard error stream during Chord's execution || "${chord.out.dir}/log.txt" ||
|| *_Program properties_* || || ||
|| chord.main.class   || Fully-qualified name of main class of program to be analyzed (e.g. "com.example.Main") || ||
|| chord.class.path   || Class path of program to be analyzed (${sun.boot.class.path} is implicitly appended) || ||
|| chord.src.path     || Java source path of program to be analyzed || ||
|| *_Program scope properties_* || || ||
|| chord.scope.kind   || Algorithm to compute program scope ["rta"|"dynamic"] || "rta" ||
|| chord.reuse.scope  || Use program scope specified by ${chord.classes.file} and ${chord.methods.file} || "false" ||
|| chord.classes.file || Location of file from/to which list of classes deemed reachable is read/written || "${chord.out.dir}/classes.txt" ||
|| chord.methods.file || Location of file from/to which list of methods deemed reachable is read/written || "${chord.out.dir}/methods.txt" ||
|| *_Program analysis properties_* || || ||
|| chord.java.analysis.path || Classpath containing program analyses in Java (i.e. @Chord-annotated classes) || "${chord.home.dir}/classes/main" ||
|| chord.dlog.analysis.path || Path of directories containing program analyses in Datalog (i.e. .datalog and .dlog files) || "${chord.home.dir}/src/main/dlog" ||
|| chord.analyses || List of names of program analyses to be run in order || "" ||
|| *_BDD-based Datalog solver properties_* || || ||
|| chord.bddbddb.work.dir || || ||
|| chord.bddbddb.max.heap || || ||
|| chord.bddbddb.noisy || || || 
|| *_Program instrumentation properties_* || || ||
|| chord.instr.exclude || List of prefixes of names of classes and packages to exclude from instrumentation || "java.,sun.,com." ||
|| chord.run.ids || List of IDs to identify program runs || "0" ||
|| chord.args.XXX || Command line arguments to be passed to run having ID XXX || "" ||
|| chord.boot.classes.dir || || ||
|| chord.user.classes.dir || || || 
|| chord.runtime.max.heap || || ||
|| chord.instr.scheme.file || || ||
|| chord.crude.trace.file || || ||
|| chord.final.trace.file || || ||
|| chord.trace.block.size || || ||
|| *_Program transformation properties_* || || ||
|| chord.ssa || Do SSA transformation for all methods deemed reachable ["true"|"false"] || "true" ||
|| *_Chord resource properties_* || || ||
|| chord.main.class.path || || ||
|| chord.bddbddb.class.path || || ||
|| chord.instr.agent.file || || ||
